page.title: 07Timothy Watson of Turnditch
page.content: A DAY IN MY LIFE ____________________ I get up at 7.30 a.m..First of all I get my clothes out then I go across to see if my mum is awake. Next I go downstairs to watch television. About half an hour later, I get dressed and then I have my breakfast. I usually have toast and a drink of coffee. When I get to school, I play football until it is time to start school. First we have assembly and then we do Maths until playtime at 10.40..After play,we do English. We play football after dinner.At 3.30 I go home.I might go to the shop to buy a few sweets. Later I go down to Shaun Spencer's house. We go out training until about 9'o clock. Then I watch television for a bit before having a bath and cleaning my teeth and going to bed.Last of all, I set the alarm on my watch for 7.30.
